descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Continuing the Architectural Engineering and Design specialization in the Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering. Design thinking and creativity, history of architecture, engineering structures, case studies in architectural engineering and design including critiques.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Junior standing or higher in engineering; AE & D II or permission of instructor.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: The course will be taught by Laurence O. Booth, Richard C. Halpern (Rise International Distinguished Architect in Residence), and also by guest lecturers.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: PROJECTS: Research and reports on understanding a city and its infrastructure.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Steve Jobs / Walter Isaacson / ISBN 978-1451648546 / 2013 / Simon & Schuster
